formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu diesem AGI-Befehl in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Usage: RECEIVE CHAR <timeout> Receives a character of text on a channel. Specify timeout to be the maximum time to wait for input in milliseconds, or 0 for infinite. Most channels do not support the reception of text. Returns the decimal value of the character if one is received, or 0 if the channel does not support text reception. Returns -1 only on error/hangup.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,3 +4,4 @@ do not support the reception of text. Returns the decimal value of the character if one is received, or 0 if the channel does not support text reception. Returns -1 only on error/hangup. + Runs Dead : No
